Module project.notizprogrammrepository
Package project.notizprogrammrepository.view.Note

Class NoteSegmentView

java.lang.Object
project.notizprogrammrepository.view.SegmentView
project.notizprogrammrepository.view.Note.NoteSegmentView
public class NoteSegmentView extends SegmentView
A view component representing the NoteSegment of the application.

    • NoteSegmentView

      public NoteSegmentView(double x, double y, double width, double height, Month month, Controller controller, CollectionSegmentView collectionSegmentView)
      Creates a new NoteSegmentView of the given size at the given position with the given month.
      Parameters:
      x - The x position of the component.
      y - The y position of the component.
      width - The width of the component.
      height - The height of the component.
      month - The month the component will show first.
      controller - The Controller used for access to the data.
      collectionSegmentView - The CollectionSegmentView called by the collectionViewButton.
